creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
[Creating this bug as a reminder]

StringFromFile leaves the input file(s) open at the end of a test, which means
(on some systems at least) that they cannot be editted.

It would be useful if there was a way for functions to be notified of the end of
a test...

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Added Test Listener support for functions, and added TestListener to
StringFromFile in CVS rel 2.0
